channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.2.31
item.description:
About v10.2.31 Update

  • v10.2.31: Minor update.
  • v10.2.30: Minor update.
  • v10.2.29: Minor update.
  • v10.2.28: Fixed a status message issue in Yosemite.
  • v10.2.27: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.26: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.25: Fixed Xcode 6 issue.
  • v10.2.24: Fixed Xcode 6 issue.
  • v10.2.23: Build by Xcode 6.
  • v10.2.22: Minor update.
  • v10.2.21: Fixed an issue: EventViewer does not show control-tab and control-shift-tab event when Full Keyboard Access is enabled.
  • v10.2.20: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.19: "Restart AXNotifier" button has been added into Preferences.
  • v10.2.18: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.17: Minor update.
  • v10.2.16: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.15: Stability at reloading XML has been improved.
  • v10.2.14: Minor update.
  • v10.2.13: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.12: Minor update.
  • v10.2.11: Minor update.
  • v10.2.10: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.9: The following filters have been added.
    • modifierlocked_only
    • modifierlocked_not
    • modifierstuck_only
    • modifierstuck_not
  • v10.2.8: Minor update.
  • v10.2.7: Minor update.
  • v10.2.6: Minor update.
  • v10.2.5: Minor update.
  • v10.2.4: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.3: Fix dmg package.
  • v10.2.2: Sparkle has been updated.
  • v10.2.1: Prepared settings have been updated.
Karabiner Web Site
